mapper.update: update cart set state=0, cart_day=sysdate where id=#{id} and isbn=#{str}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where id=#{id} and isbn=#{str}
mapper.select: select b.image_path,b.title, c.cart_day from book b, cart c where b.isbn = c.isbn and c.state=1 and c.id=#{id} order by c.cart_day desc
select * from cart where id=#{id} and isbn=#{isbn}
